frontend/src/components/layouts/.description: Header components (AdminHeader, OrgHeader) share ~70% code duplication. Both use identical patterns for: sticky header wrapper with backdrop blur, search input with icon, ThemeToggle, and NotificationDropdown.

frontend/src/components/shared/.description: Shared components folder contains reusable UI components like theme-toggle.tsx and page-header.tsx. New shared header components should be placed in shared/header/ subfolder.
